summary: Coldplay is a British rock band formed in 1997 in London. The members met at university and released their first album, "Parachutes," in 2000, which won several awards. They gained popularity with songs like "Yellow" and "Viva la Vida." The band has sold over 100 million albums and is known for their live shows. They've explored different music genres in their albums and are involved in charity work and activism. Coldplay is one of the best-selling music acts globally and has been recognized for their impact on music and climate action.
title: Coldplay
